insertion.description: Insertion Sort builds a sorted array one item at a time by comparing and inserting each element into its correct position, similar to sorting playing cards in your hands.

steps.1: Start with first element as sorted
steps.2: Take next element and compare it with all elements in the sorted portion
steps.3: Shift larger elements to the right to make space
steps.4: Insert the element in its correct position
steps.5: Repeat steps 2-4 until all elements are sorted

animation.nextKey: moving on to the next key...

task.title: Task 1 Step-wise value
task.description: Given the input array, fill in the values of array A after each for loop.

counting.description: Counting Sort is a non-comparative sorting algorithm that works by counting the occurrences of each element and placing them in their correct positions.

steps.1: Find the range of input array
steps.2: Create a counting array and count occurrences
steps.3: Modify counting array to store actual positions
steps.4: Build output array using counting array
steps.5: Copy output array back to original array

animation.calculatingSum: Calculating sum at index {{index}} using previous index {{prevIndex}}
animation.placingElement: Moving element from index {{sourceIndex}} to position {{targetIndex}}

task.title: Task 1: Determination of counting arrays
task.description: Fill in the counting arrays and construct the sorted array step by step.

radix.description: Radix Sort is a non-comparative sorting algorithm that sorts numbers by processing each digit position, starting from the least significant digit to the most significant digit.

steps.2: Sort numbers based on the current digit
steps.3: Move to the next digit to the left
steps.4: Repeat until all digits are processed

animation.finishedDigit: Finished sorting based on digit Nr.{{index}}

numbers.title: Task 1 Step-wise A value, numbers
numbers.description: Given the input array, fill in the values of array A after each for loop.

words.title: Task 2 Step-wise B value, words
words.description: Given the input array, fill in the values of array B after each for loop.

merge.description: Merge Sort is a divide-and-conquer algorithm that recursively divides the array into smaller subarrays, sorts them, and then merges them back together.

steps.1: Divide the array into two halves
steps.2: Recursively sort the left and right halves
steps.3: Merge the sorted halves back together
steps.4: Continue until the entire array is sorted
